1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Care Worker Jenny Finch arrives for her first day with new patient, Fenton Roth. He is abrasive, rude, and enigmatic - and unexpectedly bound to her world, which slowly seems to be unraveling thread by thread.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Jenny and Kathryn try to stay ahead of the game to find out Simon's link to Fenton, whilst the police investigate the murder of Michael Karlsson.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Jenny and Kathryn realise the shadow of Kanenald Mining - in the form of Berg and Lucas - has begun to fall over them, too. DS Moretti seems to be getting closer to the truth. Simon makes a desperate attempt to plan for the future.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Berg sabotages Simon's plan, and explains to him what is now required. Roth - always one step ahead of Jenny - convinces her that she only knows what he wants her to know. As Simon prepares for a noble endgame, Moretti and Adams chance upon the key that might help unlock exactly who knows what.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Moretti and Adams uncover Jenny's lie. Roth tests their patience as they search for Jenny, but has to deal with the consequences of Jenny discovering a secret. In the aftermath, Jenny is again reminded that there is far more to Roth than meets the eye.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: As Moretti and Adams close in, Simon enters the lion's den, and Jenny is forced to accept that that the only person who can help her is the one person she doesn't want to ask.

imdb.plot outline: For health-care assistant Jenny Finch, taking on a new job working for the blind - but far from helpless - Fenton Roth, could lead her one step closer to the promotion she longs for. Mr Roth, it seems, has other ideas. It is troubling enough that this old man appears to know nearly everything about Jenny, but his cryptic clues and constant challenges become more deadly when the police turn up on his doorstep investigating a crime which could destroy everything Jenny cares about.
imdb.title: Feather-Light and Paper-Thin
plot: For health-care assistant Jenny Finch, taking on a new job working for the blind - but far from helpless - Fenton Roth, could lead her one step closer to the promotion she longs for.
